summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3729 for the improvement of North 59th Street, from Phinney Avenue to Whitman Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45797, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
